attributes.action: remove all tax exemptions and benefits enjoyed by MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs should be taxed on the same basis as all citizens.  The exemptions and benefits they have granted themselves have no justification.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
